metadata.title: Service resolver configuration entry reference
metadata.description: Service resolver configuration entries are L7 traffic management tools for defining sets of service instances that resolve upstream requests and Consuls behavior when resolving them. Learn how to write `service-resolver` config entries in HCL or YAML with a specification reference, configuration model, a complete example, and example code by use case.
